mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Follows (follower_no, followed_no, follow_date) VALUES (#{follower_no}, #{followed_no}, sysdate);
mapper.select: SELECT exrecordno, exname, extype, hiscalorie, duration, notes, recorddate, startdate , exupdatedate, memberno FROM history WHERE memberno = #{memberno} AND TRUNC(recorddate) = TO_DATE(#{recorddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY recorddate DESC
SELECT TRUNC(recorddate) AS recorddate, SUM(duration) AS total_duration FROM history WHERE memberno = #{memberno} GROUP BY TRUNC(recorddate) ORDER BY TRUNC(recorddate)
SELECT TRUNC(recorddate) AS recorddate, COUNT(*) AS total_exercises FROM history WHERE memberno = #{memberno} GROUP BY TRUNC(recorddate) ORDER BY TRUNC(recorddate)
SELECT MAX(exrecordno) as exrecordno FROM history
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM history WHERE memberno = #{memberno} AND exrecordno = #{exrecordno}
DELETE FROM history WHERE memberno = #{memberno} AND TRUNC(startdate) = TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
